phrases: Good evening, mister.
This is the second time we have met like this.
It is nice to meet you, Rin.
I am Illya.
Illyasviel von Einzbern.
You know the name Einzbern, do not you?
Einzbern...
I am astonished.
In terms of raw ability, that thing outclasses Saber.
It is incredible...
That Servant could face the other six alone.
Meaning this is not an opponent we can beat with brute force, huh?
Archer, you should use your class's usual methods.
What about defense?
If it charges, I doubt you can stop it.
There are three of us.
At the very least, we will be able to hold it off.
Understood.
Emiya-kun...
It is your decision whether to run, or stay and fight.
But if you can,
try to run.
Are you done talking?
Can I get started?
Okay, I will kill you now.
Get them, Berserker.
Shirou, stand back!
No way!
They have no effect?
Emiya-kun!
Can that mass of muscle see her invisible sword?
He is powerful.
Got him!
He is too agile!
How does that thing qualify as a Berserker?
It must be a Heroic Spirit of some renown.
Even in the grip of madness, his sword skills are unblunted.
I cannot help but be impressed.
Archer, fire support.
He is less a mad warrior, and more an embodiment of savagery.
He may be mad, but his ingrained sword techniques have not left him.
Time to finish this.
Crush her, Berserker.
I will not let you win!
Tohsaka!
Archer!
It is immortal?
Ignore the stupid rabble.
After all, Archer and Rin's attacks cannot overcome your Noble Phantasm.
Follow her, Berserker.
You run away!
Understood?
Damn it.
I could not do anything...
What could I possibly do against a monster like that?
Saber...
Did not I just decide that
I would fight with you?!
Many voices and many desires confound you.
Talk is cheap.
Lies are the sin of man.
There is a sneer on your lips, holy man.
It is not a good look on you.
Is that the way it looked to you?
Indeed, it did.
A smile befitting a shameless rogue.
Did you have a pleasant encounter, Kirei?
Yes, I did.
I feel as though I have been reunited with an old acquaintance.
How could I not be happy?
As you said, the Holy Grail War has begun after a mere ten years.
As overseer, I can only pray that the miracle will be fulfilled,
and the Holy Grail will materialize this time.
Even if this land becomes a hell?
That is no concern of mine.
After all, it is the Master's role to struggle, to kill, and to trample underfoot.
Our Lord in Heaven will forgive all the sins of the world.
But first, we must wait...
Wait and see what the outcome of this first clash will be.
My, how scary.
Attacking without warning?
You are just like an animal, Rin.
Or is this the Tohsaka style of combat?
You are the one who announced the battle had started.
Once the fight's begun, there are no sneak attacks.
Or are you going to introduce yourself again?
A step too far away...
I will have to destroy those things first, huh?
Introduce myself?
If you were that boy, I might consider it.
But with you, I do not feel like it.
You do not interest me one bit.
Besides...
What do you expect me to say to someone who is going to die here?
An autonomous type that pursues automatically.
And she is generating mana at her size...
She is like some kind of mini-mage!
But high-performance familiars like these must have limitations somewhere.
What nimble prey.
I will add two more just for you.
Oh, come on!
Complain later.
If they flank me, it is all over.
In which case...
A frontal assault?
That is brave, but foolish, Rin.
Gandr!
Two left!
The familiar changed shape?!
You may have fended off Zelle, but you will not be able to block Degen.
I thought this was going to be fun.
How disappointing.
Well, this is the end for you.
It befits a disgraceful hind to be skewered.
Are you all right, Master?
No, you saved me, Archer.
To be honest, my back was against the wall.
So, where is Illyasviel?
My apologies, but my vision is poor in that regard.
Although I can sense you, Master, I cannot track enemy Masters.
I suppose not.
Anyway, what a monster...
She is superhumanly gifted, creating familiars out of single hairs like that.
So it would seem.
The proper course of action would be to defeat Berserker's Master first,
but that seems no easy task, either.
In which case...
We have no choice but to pin our hopes on Saber.
Stay put and watch the battlefield from above.
I will meet up with Saber.
Understood.
When it is time to withdraw, do not hesitate, Rin.
Yeah, yeah...
Tohsaka?
Emiya-kun...
Do not you Tohsaka me!
If you have no way to fight, do not you get that you are just in the way?
If you are killed without accomplishing anything, you will have died for nothing!
Why are you getting mad over that?
If I die for nothing, what business is it of yours?
It is my business!
I said I would give you a free pass for twenty-four hours,
so if you refuse to go home, you are making trouble!
For me!
Anyway, you are safe for now, so you should run.
That Illyasviel pipsqueak is determined to slaughter us all.
Sorry, but I cannot do that.
Saber's fighting her hardest, so I am not about to leave her.
Only real mages get to talk like that.
You cannot offer any support, so all you will do is die for nothing.
There has to be something!
As long as I have a body, there should be something I can do.
Now, look here!
And besides, Tohsaka...
Will you make someone else do something you cannot do on your own?
I should expect no less of Saber.
She deliberately let Berserker's blow land.
Yeah.
Did she do it to lure Berserker here?
Right.
Fighting that thing without cover would be suicide.
That is why Saber chose this location.
As well as to draw Berserker away from you, Emiya-kun.
Of course, she could not expect any support from Archer in a battle like this.
But this is an opponent that can neutralize even Archer's arrows.
Support from him was pointless all along.
Archer's bow...
We have neither desire to converse, nor freedom to name ourselves.
Our conversation is limited to blows meant to kill one another.
Very well, I shall answer with a strike of all my might.
Here I come.
This is where you die, Berserker!
Is it over?
Saber!
Archer?
What do you mean by get clear?
That was magnificent.
But not enough.
Regeneration?
No, that is almost like time reversal,
the curse of resurrection.
A Noble Phantasm that activates upon his death!
Shirou, stay back!
He is...
Shirou?
It survived an A-rank Noble Phantasm without a scratch.
Shirou, what was that?
Archer's arrow.
Beyond that, I do not know.
Crap.
I have changed my mind about you, Rin.
Your Archer is impressive.
That is enough.
Return to me, Berserker.
I would hoped to get the boring stuff out of the way first,
but my plans have changed.
What?
You are running?
Yes, I changed my mind.
I do not care about Saber, but your Archer has piqued my interest.
So I will let you live a while longer.
Okay, bye-bye.
Let us play again sometime, mister.
Master...
Thank you for saving me from that,
but would you mind unhanding me?
Oh, right...
Sorry.
Huh?
Shirou, what is the matter?
Are you unwell?
Shirou!
Shirou, hold on!
Shirou!
Is that person called Saber-san?
This is our first time having a new foreign student.
It is because the Holy Grail War is a death match.
A witch inhabiting the Ryuudou Temple, huh?
I shall see to it that you win the Grail,
Next Time Finding the Will to Fight
so that I might fulfill my own wish.
